summary: A fourth grader and her friends deal with bullying from a more popular girl in their class.
cast: Sammi Hanratty|Annabeth Gish|Timothy Bottoms|Michael Learned|Austin Thomas|Adair Tishler|Ariela Barer|Kaitlyn Dever|Shelby Harmon|Don Franklin|Joanne Baron|Christian Pikes|Jennifer Tilly|Jennifer Parsons|Kaylin Stewart|Lucy Angelo|Ashley Ausburn|Maria Paula Gonzalez|David J Law|Grace Rolek|Preston Strother|Tyler Strother
title: Acoso en las aulas
